data.title: December 23rd, 1941
data.text:
Meeting with British Prime Min. Winston S. Churchill, Harry L. Hopkins, Mr. Mathews. Sec. of State Cordell Hull is mentioned as present in a memo written Jan. 17, 1945 by Mr. Mathews.

Subject: North Africa

Allied War Council: War Sec. Henry L. Stimson, Gen. George C. Marshall (Chief of Staff), Gen. Henry H. Arnold, Navy Sec. Frank Knox, Adm. Harold R. Stark (Chief of Naval Ops.), Adm. Ernest J. King, British Prime Min. Winston S. Churchill, Lord Beaverbrook, Adm. Sir Dudley Pound, Air Marshal Sir Charles Portal, Gen. Sir John Dill, Harry L. Hopkins. Gen. Edwin M. Watson, Adm. John R. Beardall (US) and Brig. Hollis (UK) also attended.

Subject: Discussion of all War Theaters.
